```py
>>> lst = ['a', 'a', 'b', 'b']
>>> ser = pd.Series([1, 2, 3, 4], index=lst)
>>> ser
a    1
a    2
b    3
b    4
dtype: int64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).max()
a    2
b    4
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> data = [[1, 8, 2], [1, 2, 5], [2, 5, 8], [2, 6, 9]]
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["a", "b", "c"],
...                   index=["tiger", "leopard", "cheetah", "lion"])
>>> df
 a  b  c
 tiger   1  8  2
leopard   1  2  5
cheetah   2  5  8
 lion   2  6  9
>>> df.groupby("a").max()
 b  c
a
1   8  5
2   6  9 
```
